alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 07 at 4:02PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Freezing fog expected again tonight... Patchy fog remains across midslope and summits mainly across Elko county. Fog is expected to redevelop and expand in lower valley areas tonight primarily east of Battle Mountain along I-80 where a persistent snowpack still exists. US-93 in Elko county also has the potential for fog redevelopment. Visibility could drop to less than one half mile at times as patches of denser fog develops although widespread dense fog is not expected. Nonetheless, some travel impacts are expected particularly early Thursday morning with some slick roadways anticipated. Fog could persist into the late morning hours but should lift from valley bottoms by early afternoon. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
